name: Translucent Discord (Patched Discord + BD)
description:
You need BetterDiscord to inject transparent theme and transparency patched Discord. Rough instructions (You need Node installed):
npm install -g asar
Extract %appdata%\discord\(latest version)\modules\discord_desktop_core\core.asar with
asar extract core.asar core
core/app/mainScreen.js
Set transparent -> true around line 290, remove backgroundColor line and save

Remove/Backup&Remove core.asar and then:
asar pack core core.asar
Relaunch discord.
In case betterdiscord options are now gone, you need to reinstall BD (so it patches on top of transparency trick): BD
Set Custom CSS in betterdiscord with this. (without @-moz-document brackets)
additional_info:
• Brought back traffic light window buttons by having a tad more bulletproof class definitions
  • Updated the theme to support Discord 0.0.301
  • Updated the theme to support Games Tab
